person.persName: Allen P. Borders (Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky, wharf boat driver)

body.p: Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky, wharf boat driver. Kentucky native. Son of Archibald Borders and Jane Borders. Married to Louisa Borders. Father of Angeline Borders, Jane Borders, Milard Borders, and Addie Borders. Clerk in Lawrence County, Kentucky in 1850. Wharf boat driver in Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned A.P. Borders & Company, wholesaler dealer, in Catlettsburg in 1862. Employed Hiram Preston on the wharf boat in Catlettsburg in 1860.
